contentrichtext.text: {{Italic title prefixed|3}} Two ships of the [[United States Navy]] have borne the name '''USS ''Miller'''''. *{{USS|Miller|DD-535}}, was a [[Fletcher class destroyer|''Fletcher''-class]] [[destroyer]], launched in 1943, renamed ''James Miller'' in 1973, and struck in 1974 *{{USS|Miller|FF-1091}}, was a [[Knox class frigate|''Knox''-class]] frigate launched in 1973, reclassified in 1975, and struck in 1995. ==See also== *[[USS Jack Miller (DE-410)]] *[[USS William C. Miller (DE-259)]] *[[USNS Sgt. Andrew Miller (T-AK-242)]] {{Shipindex}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Miller}} [[Category:United States Navy ship names]]
